description:
Disney Plus has become a rather diverse streaming service since its initial debut. Now, in addition to the family-friendly content that subscribers have come to expect, Disney Plus also offers R-rated fare for those whose permissions allow it. Now one controversial R-rated movie is dominating the Disney Plus streaming charts as a result. At the [...]

The post Controversial R-Rated Movie Dominates Disney Plus Charts appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Controversial R-Rated Movie Dominates Disney Plus Charts
